name: ORD_AUD_APPT_INFO_2
description: This table contains audit information about the appointment-level info for imaging studies.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_BEGIN_TIMES
columns.description: Audit information about the appoitment begin times.  The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_APPT_INFO.APPT_EXAM_BGN_TIME.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_BEGIN_DATES
columns.description: Audit information about the appoitment begin dates. The values are delimited by "^". The source item is located at ORDER_APPT_INFO.APPT_EXAM_BGN_DATE.
